# Keyboard Input (Kbd) Component

### Keyboard Input (Kbd)

**Exports:**
- `Kbd.Root` - Root keyboard input display
- `Kbd.Group` - Group of keyboard inputs

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { Kbd } from 'kampsy-ui';
</script>

<div>
    <Kbd.Group>
    	<Kbd.Root>⌘</Kbd.Root>
    	<Kbd.Root>⇧</Kbd.Root>
    	<Kbd.Root>⌥</Kbd.Root>
    	<Kbd.Root>⌃</Kbd.Root>
    </Kbd.Group>
</div>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/keyboard-input for full documentation and examples.
